entry.card_html: Organization and support for the many details of life as a prostate cancer survivor
entry.name: care_plan

entry.card_html: Explore your values, your preferences, and the current medical knowledge to help you discuss your treatment options with your doctors.
entry.name: decision_support_p3p

entry.card_html: Learn about symptoms that are common in men with prostate cancer, and about ways to manage and improve these symptoms.
entry.name: self_management

entry.card_html: Learn strategies for developing a new normal in your sex life after treatment for prostate cancer.
entry.name: sexual_recovery

entry.custom_text: Report your health in order to improve prostate cancer care
entry.name: landing title

entry.custom_text:
(greeting),

This email was sent to you because you are a patient at (clinic name) and consented to participate in the Prostate Cancer Outcomes - (parent org) Registry Study.

This is an invitation to use the TrueNTH website, where you will report on your health. Your participation will help us collectively improve the care that men receive during their prostate cancer journey.

To complete your first questionnaire, please first verify your account.

Verify your account

You can also access the TrueNTH website with this link:

{0}

Save this email so that you can return to TrueNTH any time.

If you have any queries, please contact your representative at (clinic name).
entry.name: profileSendEmail invite email_body

entry.custom_text:
Hello,

This email was sent to you by (clinic name). This is where you report on your health along your prostate cancer journey. The information collected will be used to determine where improvements in Prostate Cancer Care can be made.

Login now to complete your questionnaire.

Verify your account and answer questionnaire now

Click the button above or use the link below to visit TrueNTH:

{0}

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact (clinic name).

— This email was sent because you consented to participate in the TrueNTH registry project
entry.name: profileSendEmail reminder email_body
profileSendEmail invite email TrueNTH Global Registry
site summary email TrueNTH Global Registry

entry.custom_text: Report your health on TrueNTH. Email from (clinic name)

DEFAULT_LOCALE = 'en_AU'

PATIENT_LIST_ADDL_FIELDS = ['status','study_id']
PORTAL_STYLESHEET = '/eproms/static/css/eproms.css'
STAFF_BULK_DATA_ACCESS = True
SMARTLING_PROJECT_ID = 'dd112801a'
REQUIRED_CORE_DATA = ['org', 'website_terms_of_use', 'subject_website_consent', 'stored_website_consent_form', 'privacy_policy', 'race', 'ethnicity']
SHOW_EXPLORE = False
SHOW_PROFILE_MACROS = ['race', 'ethnicity', 'language', 'procedures']
SHOW_PUBLIC_TERMS = False
USER_FORGOT_PASSWORD_EMAIL_TEMPLATE = 'flask_user/emails/eproms_forgot_password'
USER_PASSWORD_CHANGED_EMAIL_TEMPLATE = 'flask_user/emails/eproms_password_changed'
CONSENT_EDIT_PERMISSIBLE_ROLES = ['staff', 'admin']
CUSTOM_PATIENT_DETAIL = True
LOCALIZED_AFFILIATE_ORG = 'TrueNTH Global Registry'

HIDE_TRUENTH_ID_FIELD = True
TRUENTH_LINK_URL = False
